name: Solar System (itch) (anuragparcha)
description:
Solar System Project for coursera course for game development using Unity3D.

I added the following features:

1. A model of Solar System including all 8 planets + pluto.

2. Comets which spawn at 8 second intervals.

3. Audio effects and visual effects such as trails.

Credits:

Created by Anurag Parcha
